main_subtitle: Trying my best in life to get things done, please take a look around to get to know me.
about_text: I am currently studying in internet and multimedia technologies in France. Trying some shit out, i’ll probably do something great one day.
I started being interessed in coding with Discord bots, trying out Discord.js module. Then I chose every coding path at school, because I had it in mind.
Today I’m trying to get my life together and struggle to get things done.

work_sect.text: Get to see the collection of my websites. They’re all trash but at least i’ve done some things i guess ? idk what it’s worth in the end
